Module org.panteleyev.fx

Package org.panteleyev.fx

package org.panteleyev.fx
Helper classes for JavaFX.

  • Class
    Description
    BaseDialog<R>
    Base class for dialogs.
    BoxFactory
    This class provides methods to create instances of HBox and VBox.
    ButtonFactory
    This class provides convenience methods to create buttons.
    Controller
    Base class for UI controller.
    FxFactory
    This class provides convenience methods to create and configure various JavaFX controls in one method call.
    FxUtils
    This class provides common utility methods.
    LabelFactory
    This class provides convenience methods to create objects of Label.
    MenuFactory
    This class provides convenience methods to create menus, menu items, etc.
    PredicateProperty<T>
    This class implements property that wraps Predicate instance.
    ReadOnlyStringConverter<T>
     
    StagePositionAndSize
    This class represents position and size of the stage including maximized flag.
    TabFactory
     
    TableColumnBuilder<S,T>
    This class implements builder that creates instances of TableColumn.
    TitledPaneBuilder
    This class implements builder that creates instances of TitledPane.
    ToStringConverter<T>
     
    TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T>
    This class implements builder that creates instances of TreeTableColumn.
    TreeTableFactory
    This class provides convenience method to create objects of the following classes: TreeTableColumn TreeItem
    WindowManager
    This class implements window manager to manipulate active controllers opened by the application.
